common.informationAboutTrademarksAnd: Information about trademarks and intellectual property rights.
common.theFollowingMarksAre: The following marks are trademarks or registered trademarks of Fincept LP in the United States and other countries:
common.allRightsInThese: All rights in these trademarks are reserved. Unauthorized use is strictly prohibited.
common.theFollowingAreTrademarks: The following are trademarks or registered trademarks of their respective owners:
common.allThirdpartyTrademarksMentioned: All third-party trademarks mentioned are the property of their respective owners. Use of these marks does not imply endorsement by or affiliation with Fincept.
common.ifYouWishTo: If you wish to use any Fincept trademark, please follow these guidelines:
common.referentialUseToIdentify: Referential use to identify Fincept products or services
common.academicOrJournalisticReferences: Academic or journalistic references with proper attribution
common.useInComparativeAdvertising: Use in comparative advertising when truthful and not misleading
common.useAsPartOf: Use as part of your own trademark or business name
common.useThatImpliesSponsorship: Use that implies sponsorship, endorsement, or affiliation
common.modificationAlterationOrCombination: Modification, alteration, or combination with other marks
common.useInAWay: Use in a way that disparages or damages Fincept's reputation
common.theContentFeaturesAnd: The content, features, and functionality of Fincept Terminal are protected by copyright, trademark, patent, and other intellectual property laws.
common.reproductionModificationOrDistribution: Reproduction, modification, or distribution of any content without written permission is strictly prohibited.
common.marketDataAndFinancial: Market data and financial information are provided by various third-party sources. Each data provider retains all rights to their content:
common.usersMustComplyWith: Users must comply with all third-party data provider terms and conditions.
common.ifYouBelieveYour: If you believe your trademark rights have been infringed, or if you discover unauthorized use of Fincept trademarks, please contact us:
common.addressFinceptLp123: Address: Fincept LP, 123 Financial District, New York, NY 10004
common.pleaseReadTheseTerms: Please read these terms carefully before using Fincept services.
common.byAccessingAndUsing: By accessing and using Fincept Terminal ("Service"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.
common.ifYouDoNot: If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.
common.finceptTerminalIsA: Fincept Terminal is a professional financial analytics and data platform that provides real-time market data, financial analysis tools, and portfolio management capabilities.
common.theServiceIncludesBoth: The Service includes both free guest access with limited features and paid subscription tiers with enhanced functionality.
common.toAccessCertainFeatures: To access certain features of the Service, you must register for an account. You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information during the registration process.
common.youAreResponsibleFor: You are responsible for safeguarding the password and all activities that occur under your account.
common.youMustNotifyUs: You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.
common.youAgreeNotTo: You agree not to use the Service to:
common.violateAnyApplicableLaws: Violate any applicable laws or regulations
common.transmitAnyHarmfulOffensive: Transmit any harmful, offensive, or disruptive content
common.attemptToGainUnauthorized: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems
common.useAutomatedScriptsOr: Use automated scripts or bots without permission
common.redistributeOrResellOur: Redistribute or resell our data without authorization
common.yourPrivacyIsImportant: Your privacy is important to us. Our data collection and usage practices are detailed in our Privacy Policy, which forms part of these Terms.
common.marketDataProvidedThrough: Market data provided through the Service is sourced from third-party providers and is subject to their respective terms and conditions.
common.paidSubscriptionsAreBilled: Paid subscriptions are billed in advance on a monthly or annual basis. All fees are non-refundable except as required by law.
common.weReserveTheRight: We reserve the right to change our pricing with 30 days' notice to existing subscribers.
common.yourSubscriptionWillAutomatically: Your subscription will automatically renew unless cancelled before the renewal date.
common.theServiceIsProvided: The Service is provided "as is" without any warranties, express or implied. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of market data.
common.investmentDecisionsShouldNot: Investment decisions should not be based solely on information provided by our Service. Always consult with qualified financial advisors.
common.ourLiabilityIsLimited: Our liability is limited to the amount paid for the Service in the preceding 12 months.
common.weMayTerminateOr: We may terminate or suspend your account immediately, without prior notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms or is harmful to other users, us, or third parties.
common.youMayTerminateYour: You may terminate your account at any time by contacting our support team.
common.weReserveTheRight1: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will notify users of significant changes via email or through the Service.
common.continuedUseOfThe: Continued use of the Service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.
common.ifYouHaveQuestions: If you have questions about these Terms, please contact us at:
